author: Sabrina Mi
date: 11/26/2023
---

```{r}
"%&%" = function(a,b) paste(a,b,sep="")
chr = as.character(20)
output_dir <- "~/chr" %&% chr %&% "-qtl2-outputs/"
batches <- list.files(output_dir)
n_batches <- length(batches)
```



```{r}
id = "000789972A"
mat <- matrix(, nrow = 8)
for (i in 1:n_batches) {
  pr <- readRDS(output_dir %&% batches[i])
  mat <- rbind(pr[[1]][1, , ])
}
mat <- t(mat)
write.csv(mat, output_dir %&% id %&% ".csv" )
```
